comments:
Build 20020917

If you generate a new wizard class using the PDE manifest editor you will get 
a NullPointerException.

STEPS
1) Add an extension for org.eclipse.ui.newWizards in the Extensions pane of 
the Manifest Editor
2) Select New-> Wizard
3) Open the Properties
4) Hit the ... button for the class name
5) Select create Java class and fill in the details
6) Hit Finish

!ENTRY org.eclipse.pde.ui 4 0 Sep 19, 2002 09:25:15.672
